data.comment: Today's referee, Stephen Martin, has blown to start the match.
Goal! Yuri Ribeiro gives Nottingham a 1-0 lead in Nottingham.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at City Ground.
The away team have replaced Kadeem Harris with Callum Paterson. This is the first substitution made today by Tony Pulis.
In the minute 76, The home team replace Lyle Taylor with Lewis Grabban.
Isaiah Brown is on a sub for Liam Shaw for Sheffield Wed.
Sheffield Wed make their third substitution with Alex Hunt replacing Josh Windass.
In the minute 80, Jordan Rhodes is replacing Joost van Aken for the away team.
At City Ground, Moses Odubajo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
It's now 2-0 in Nottingham as Lewis Grabban scores for Nottingham.
In the minute 89, Chris Hughton (Nottingham) is making a second substitution, with Joe Lolley replacing Alexander Mighten.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
